text: Sometimes the best solutions come when you just restart your computer.
author: OOUPSS

text: Problem-solving often starts with: 'What if I just delete everything?'
author: OOUPSS

text: Programming is when solving one problem creates another problem.
author: OOUPSS

text: Coding is like cooking: sometimes you follow a recipe, other times you just improvise.
author: OOUPSS

text: In programming, there are no problems, only bugs that haven’t been found yet.
author: OOUPSS

text: My code doesn't bug, it just behaves unexpectedly.
author: OOUPSS

text: Mistakes aren’t bugs, they are subtle opportunities for improvement.
author: OOUPSS

text: If programmers were philosophers, their slogan would be: 'What if the world is just buggy?'
author: OOUPSS

text: Don’t ask me how I did it. I don’t understand it myself.
author: OOUPSS

text: If your code works, it means you missed something.
author: OOUPSS

text: Programmers are the only ones who can fix the problem they themselves created.
author: OOUPSS

text: Time doesn’t heal, but a restart helps.
author: OOUPSS

text: When your code compiles on the first try, you realize you’ve just reached the peak of your career.
author: OOUPSS

text: A programmer who doesn’t commit every hour will eventually revert to the previous state.
author: OOUPSS

text: Sometimes the only way to find a bug is to create a new one.
author: OOUPSS

text: Programmers don’t build walls, they build bridges. But sometimes they forget to include the foundation.
author: OOUPSS

text: You don’t realize you’re living on the edge of disaster until you encounter a bug.
author: OOUPSS

text: A programmer’s life is an endless cycle: bug — fix — new bug.
author: OOUPSS

text: When you write code, you’re like a magician. But only with a wand in ... and a bunch of mistakes.
author: OOUPSS

text: When you first start coding, everything seems possible. A month later, you realize that almost everything is impossible.
author: OOUPSS

text: When you fix a bug, but realize you’ve created 10 new ones.
author: OOUPSS
